title: Keys to a Happier Life
headline: Learn to develop emotional and physical strength to enjoy a happier life in this free online wellness course.
description: This free online course will teach you how your environment influences your willpower. To make the right choices for a happy life, you must evaluate your environment and have the correct information. If the surrounding is not conducive to the change you desire, it's best to leave. This course will teach you how to handle disappointments and expectations. You will also learn to receive criticism without getting personal and more. Enrol now.
courseDescription:
This course starts by introducing willpower and the environment. The environment influences who we are, who we want to be and our productivity levels. Its impact will either be positive or negative. It is hard to improve performance when the environment is not supportive. People only do enough to get by and don't focus on improving processes and delivery in their work. Such a setting does not offer motivation to do the extraordinary. Understand the environmental impact on willpower and the need to evaluate its effect on your decision-making. You can only be happy with your decisions in the right surroundings. Once you have assessed this, it's time to choose. Learn the correct information and some tips for making choices. 

Next, you will learn ways to tackle disappointments. Many people are unhappy in life because their expectations have been thwarted. Life often disappoints you so you need to know how to get back on your feet. People will always have an opinion about the choices you make. Both good and bad decisions will attract criticism. You will learn how to handle people's thoughts and make choices for a happy life. Also, you will understand how perfectionism brings about disappointment and how it might slowly make you feel unhappy. You will also learn how to develop a good mindset and its importance. Being able to see the good in pleasant and unpleasant situations is an important skill. With this ability, you can find your happiness quickly and develop positivity.

How we perceive life affects our happiness and those around us. You will learn how to change your perspective in the latter parts of the course. The change largely depends on our current perspective. You will learn also how to cope with tough seasons of life. You will understand the importance of preparedness and acknowledging the temporary nature of things we have. You will know what to look for when engaging with people or activities as such choices should make you happy. Anything that does not bring fulfilment and happiness is not worth your while. This course will help you design a conducive work environment for everyone. You will learn how to deal with difficult people and bullies. Then you discover how to keep your body in good health. The healthier you are, the happier you will be. So enrol today and start learning.
